replies.body: It's not really a glitch. The map creators made the map on a server with the plugin EmptyWorldGenerator. The plugin only creates a world with a big hole in it. Simply to fix it: create a new singleplayer world, with the preset "0:0". then you go on MCEdit and import the map in to the void world. Done.
replies.body_tagged: It's not really a glitch. The map creators made the map on a server with the plugin EmptyWorldGenerator. The plugin only creates a world with a big hole in it. Simply to fix it: create a new singleplayer world, with the preset "0:0". then you go on MCEdit and import the map in to the void world. Done.
